TopicTitle: Odd shadow graphics, much like cloud graphics last update

Articles.Content:
v0.1.2.0

Win11

Ryzen 5 5600G

Zotac RTX 3060

There is a haze around crafts when a shadow is behind them, reminiscent of the haze around craft flying through clouds.

Shadow should remain cohesive around craft.

This is just a visual thing and not very important but I know its not intentional.
